overview: Tang Mo is driven down to the mortal world by the God of Heaven and becomes a chef in a stall. One day, a mysterious old man invites him to participate in the "Top Chef Competition", promising him a prize of 5 billion dollars. During the competition, Tang Mo's amazing culinary talent attracts the attention of the public, but this also brings about the death of his rival from a gangster background
title: The King of Cookery
